title: Yen Drops After Takaichi Comment Cools Intervention Speculation
description: The yen slid after Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said a weak currency can be a major opportunity for export industries, cooling speculation that her government is poised to intervene to support the yen.
content: The yen slid after Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said a weak currency can be a major opportunity for export industries, cooling speculation that her government is poised to intervene to support the yen.
